segments.text: How do you get along with your co-workers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I get along pretty well with most of them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So how do you develop good relationships in the office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think the key point is to be considerate of your co-workers ' feelings and needs and make a good working environment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you â€™ re right , but it does seem that there are always a few coworkers that are harder to work with than others .
segments.speaker: S1
